Posts.Content: hi there may god be with you i have lung cancer myself its verry hard to live with i will pray verry hard for your friend i was in a support group at the hospital cause thy said i would only live 2 yrs in 2004 iam 36 yrs old now and its verry scarry i will pray alot for you and your friend i met 2 young girls one was 17 the other 23 thy both had breast cancer and not time to live only given a year or less to me its so depressing to be in a group cause i think it upsets you alot but i think it helped a lil after the group session i was told my cancer is showing great results i jahve alot of faith but i do hate loosing my hair all the time but i guess it will grow back anway peace and keep your faith and tell ehr to keep hers know matetr what god is always there Chrisssy
Posts.Title: Help me understand PLEASE!
